Class S3Service

java.lang.Object
com.amazonaws.lambda.mihai.tagpicture.service.S3Service
All Implemented Interfaces:
FileSystemService
public class S3Service extends Object implements FileSystemService
layer between lambda logic and AWS S3 filesystem; files are treated as objects
Author:
Mihai ADAM
